general.name: setConfig
general.shortDesc: Writes configuration file of an application.

definition.desc: Writes an application configuration file in the applications shared configuration directory.

params.name: file
params.desc: Name of the configuration file to write. If it is not specified, a file called 'conf.xml' is loaded instead.

params.name: arr
params.desc: Array to save as the configuration.

definition.return: This function does not return any value.
